history.proof: intros m n z Hinv H_exd. induction n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite <- McF.exd_f. auto. sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (cF m) n z)

Premises:
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
MF.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MF.f_1 m) n z)
MA1.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f_1 m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) n z)
MF.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MF.f m) n z)
MA1.exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f_1 m) n z)
MA0.exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (MA0.f m) (MA0.Iter_upb m z) z)
MF.exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (MF.f m) (MF.Iter_upb m z) z)
MA1.exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (MA1.f m) (MA1.Iter_upb m z) z)
MA0.Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) i (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = z
MA1.Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA1.f_1 m) i (Iter (MA1.f m) i z) = z
McF.exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cF m z)
exd_cF : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cF m z)
McF.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
cF_1_cF : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF_1 m (cF m z) = z
MA1.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.Iter_upb m z = MA1.Iter_upb m (Iter (MA1.f m) i z)
MA1.degree_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.degree m z = MA1.degree m (Iter (MA1.f m) i z)
MF.period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.Iter_upb m (Iter (MF.f m) i z)
MA1.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA1.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA1.f m) i z) = Iter (MA1.f m) (i - j) z
MA0.Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (MA0.f_1 m) j (Iter (MA0.f m) i z) = Iter (MA0.f m) (i - j) z
MF.Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f m) (S i) z = Iter (MF.f m) i (MF.f m z)
succf_exd_F : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succf m z -> exd m (F m z)
predf_exd_F_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> predf m z -> exd m (F_1 m z)
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
exd_cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z

```coq
intros m n z Hinv H_exd.
induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- McF.exd_f. auto.
Qed.
```
